data: `minecraft:behavior.hold_ground` allows an entity to stop in their current location, turn to face a mob they are targeting and react with an event.
`minecraft:behavior.hold_ground` requires a target in order to work properly. Target can be determined by using one of the following behaviors:

data.Name: broadcast
data.Description: Whether to broadcast out the mob's target to other mobs of the same type.

data.Name: broadcast_range
data.Description: Range in blocks for how far to broadcast.

data.Name: min_radius
data.Description: Minimum distance the target must be for the mob to run this goal.

data.Name: within_radius_event
data.Description: Event to run when target is within the radius. This event is broadcasted if broadcast is true.
